title: Allow the Article/Comments activities to be restored. (#16)
message:
Allow the Article/Comments activities to be restored. (#16)

- Introduce RxAndroid for making requests from within fragments/activities.
- Remove state machines from the Article & Comment fragments (which made them difficult to modify).
- Have fragments make their own network requests so they do not depend on the containing activity (which made restore difficult and limited reuse).
- Upgrade SDK version and build tools.
- Upgrade gradle.
- Upgrade dependencies.

title: Add initial contribution guidelines. (#12)
message: Add initial contribution guidelines. (#12)

title: Ensure device rotation is handled. (#10)
message: Ensure device rotation is handled. (#10)

title: Upgrade Gradle version to 2.10.
message: Upgrade Gradle version to 2.10.

title: Enable JavaScript in the Article WebView.
message:
Enable JavaScript in the Article WebView.

Fixes #8

title: Upgrade to build tools 2.1.2.
message: Upgrade to build tools 2.1.2.

title: Remove the `Item` interface. Use `Story` over `Item` for consistent naming.
message:
Remove the `Item` interface. Use `Story` over `Item` for consistent naming.

Prefer the concrete `Story` over the abstract `Item` as it's only ever
used in place of a `Story` and it removes the need to downcast
everywhere.

title: Allow Hacker News comment pages to be opened in Hex.
message:
Allow Hacker News comment pages to be opened in Hex.

Closes #6.

title: Add Apache License 2.0.
message: Add Apache License 2.0.

title: Prevent article callbacks being triggering after it is closed.
message:
Prevent article callbacks being triggering after it is closed.

Transition the state machine into an final `inactive` state when the
view is destroyed.

title: Introduce a `ObservableWebView` to allow WebView scroll observation on API 21+.
message: Introduce a `ObservableWebView` to allow WebView scroll observation on API 21+.

title: Only allow swipe-refresh when an article webview is scrolled to the top.
message: Only allow swipe-refresh when an article webview is scrolled to the top.

title: Update build tools version in Travis config.
message: Update build tools version in Travis config.

title: Remove finger from app screenshots. Correct alignment on Screenshot 1.
message: Remove finger from app screenshots. Correct alignment on Screenshot 1.

title: Only delegate back control the WebView when it is in focus.
message: Only delegate back control the WebView when it is in focus.

title: Upgrade build tools version.
message: Upgrade build tools version.

title: Ensure the refresh spinners are always visible from the Article and Comment fragments.
message:
Ensure the refresh spinners are always visible from the Article and Comment fragments.

They were previously hidden because the SwipeRefreshLayout was hidden
when the unavailable view was showing.

title: Always show the refresh failed snackbar when loading the front page.
message: Always show the refresh failed snackbar when loading the front page.

title: Use consistent style for resource values.
message: Use consistent style for resource values.

title: Use namespaced string resource naming.
message: Use namespaced string resource naming.

title: Centralise the API URL. Update to api.hexforhn.com.
message: Centralise the API URL. Update to api.hexforhn.com.

title: Correct typo and update API info in README.
message: Correct typo and update API info in README.

title: Show article loading spinner until loading has finished.
message:
Show article loading spinner until loading has finished.

Although this masks the very top of the content for a short period it
provides the user with a clearer picture that an article is still
loading.

title: Support use of the back button in the article web view.
message:
Support use of the back button in the article web view.

Closes #4.

title: Introduce state machines to the story section. Handle network unavailability.
message:
Introduce state machines to the story section. Handle network unavailability.

Closes #3.

title: Setup Travis CI.
message:
Setup Travis CI.

Run unit tests only for the time being. There are currently some issues
testing with the API 23 emulators:
http://stackoverflow.com/q/32952413/642196

title: Add missing orientation values to layouts.
message: Add missing orientation values to layouts.

title: Clean up use of state machine pattern. Introduce dedicated refresh spinner manager.
message: Clean up use of state machine pattern. Introduce dedicated refresh spinner manager.

title: Introduce a state machine to drive the Front Page activity.
message:
Introduce a state machine to drive the Front Page activity.

* Extract activities into packages.

title: Remove 'Content Unavailable' flicker by placing view inside the…
message:
Remove 'Content Unavailable' flicker by placing view inside the SwipeRefreshLayout and disabling it.

Clean up the front page in the process.

Related to #3.

title: Improve handling of no network on the article view.
message:
Improve handling of no network on the article view.

* Give `WebViewFragment` a 'Content Unavailable' screen to show when
  articles cannot be retrieved.

Related to #3.

title: Improve handling of no network on the comments view.
message:
Improve handling of no network on the comments view.

* Introduce a failure method to the `GetItem` task.
* Make `CommentsFragment` and `WebViewFragment` dumb.
* Make a single service request from `StoryActivity`.
* Route comment refresh requests through `StoryActivity`.
* Give `CommentsFragment` a 'Content Unavailable' screen to show when
  comments cannot be retrieved.

Related to #3.

title: Show a less generic message when the front page cannot be loaded.
message:
Show a less generic message when the front page cannot be loaded.

Related to #3.

title: Display a "Content Unavailable" screen when front page items cannot be fetched.
message:
Display a "Content Unavailable" screen when front page items cannot be fetched.

Related to #3.

title: Rename `Try Again` I18N key to indicate it is a default value.
message: Rename `Try Again` I18N key to indicate it is a default value.

message: Introduce a "Content Unavailable" view.

title: Stack article thumbnails on top of the missing image thumbnail.
message:
Stack article thumbnails on top of the missing image thumbnail.

This ensures the missing thumbnail is shown immediately, and the real
thumbnail is overlaid when loaded.

* Rename `home_list_item` to `front_page_list_item`.

title: Change RecyclerView list item click only handle regular clicks.
message:
Change RecyclerView list item click only handle regular clicks.

Long clicks are not yet handled and should not result in regular click
behaviour.

* Use `RecycerView#getAdapterPosition` over deprecated
  `RecycerView#getPosition`.

title: Show a thumbnail for each article, obtained from the Clearbit Logo API.
message:
Show a thumbnail for each article, obtained from the Clearbit Logo API.

* Download and crop the thumbnail using Picasso.
* Include a fallback image, supplied to Picasso when a logo is not found
  or the request fails.
* Give visual feedback from the list items when they are clicked.

title: Plug into custom Hacker News API to retrieve real HN data.
message:
Plug into custom Hacker News API to retrieve real HN data.

* Use Volley for network requests.
* Use Joda for marshalling ISO8601 times.
* Create and consume services and marshallers for the custom HN API.
* Use "Front Page" over "Top Items" naming consistently.
